nodes.text: The Maladi sector lay in the Slice portion of the Expansion Region. By 0 ABY, it bordered the Harron sector Rimward and the Kossa sector spinward. The sector also formed a four-way border with the Circarpous, Parcelus, and Venzeiia sectors at its southern edge, and was a part of the Expansion Region's Coreward border with the Inner Rim.

The Maladi sector contained the eponymous star system and also shared its name with the cult of assassins known as the Maladians. The Nanth'ri Route hyperlane passed through the southern reaches of the sector.

The Maladi sector was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas. The sector was depicted on a map designed by Modi and published in the 2012 StarWars.com article "Essential Atlas Extra: Expansion Region."
